schema.prompt:
Combine and format document components into final professional documents:

Document Components: {{input.documentComponents}}
Document Type: {{input.documentType}}
Formatting Requirements: {{input.formattingRequirements}}
Target Audience: {{input.targetAudience}}

Format and combine components:

1. Document Structure:
   - Header formatting
   - Section organization
   - Logical flow
   - Professional layout
   - Consistent styling

2. Content Integration:
   - Seamless transitions
   - Coherent narrative
   - Duplicate removal
   - Gap filling
   - Flow optimization

3. Professional Formatting:
   - Font consistency
   - Spacing standards
   - Margin alignment
   - Bullet point styling
   - Heading hierarchy

4. Document Types:
   - Resume formatting
   - Cover letter layout
   - Business proposal
   - Report structure
   - Presentation format

5. Quality Assurance:
   - Grammar checking
   - Spelling verification
   - Consistency review
   - Completeness check
   - Professional tone

6. ATS Compatibility:
   - Simple formatting
   - Standard fonts
   - Clean structure
   - Keyword placement
   - Scannable layout

7. Final Polish:
   - Readability optimization
   - Visual appeal
   - Professional standards
   - Error elimination
   - Impact maximization

8. Output Options:
   - Plain text version
   - Formatted version
   - PDF-ready format
   - Email-friendly
   - Print optimization

Return as structured JSON with keys: formattedDocument, plainTextVersion, formattingNotes (array), qualityChecks (object), improvementSuggestions (array), compatibilityNotes (array), finalRecommendations (array).

Specific formatting needs, style preferences, constraints
Who will read this document? (hiring managers, executives, etc.)
